subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants, despite playing without the injured Brandon Jacobs and Plaxico Burress, produced plenty of points thanks to Eli Manning who completed 26 of 33 passes for 240 yards spread among seven receivers.
snippet: The Giants, despite playing without the injured Brandon Jacobs and Plaxico Burress, produced plenty of points thanks to Eli Manning who completed 26 of 33 passes for 240 yards spread among seven receivers.
